source: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_00<tab>The researcher Claudien could use an adventurer's assistance in dispatching some bothersome birds.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_00<tab>ハイブリッジの遺跡調査員クラウディエンは、冒険者に仕事を頼みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_01<tab>Winged purveyors of death and destruction are wreaking havoc with Claudien's investigation of the ruins. Set handmade scarecrows at the specified locations in Highbridge.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_01<tab>遺跡調査を進めるために、鳥を追い払ってほしいらしい。ハイブリッジの<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8C2801 /var>に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86D701 /var>」を設置しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_02<tab>The scarecrows have been placed. Inform Claudien that the avian pests will disrupt his research no more.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8C2801 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86D701 /var>を設置した。ハイブリッジの「クラウディエン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_03<tab>Now free to immerse himself in his research, Claudien thanks you for your assistance.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_03<tab>クラウディエンからお礼を言われた。これで遺跡の調査も進むだろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_TODO_00<tab>Set handmade scarecrows at the specified locations.
TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_000<tab>Do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> look down, Claudien! You must not, you will not, you <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var>not look─aaaaaahhh!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_000高いところは苦手だな……。
いや、下を見なければ怖くないはずだ……
高くない、怖くない……うう、やっぱり怖い……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_001<tab>By the Twelve, my good <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, you frightened me half to death! But you must forgive me: I've been a bit restless of late, what with those winged nightmares swooping in from every which direction, pecking and poking and pricking at me.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_001わっ！　な、なんだ……驚かさないでくれよ！
まったく、あの鳥たちだけでも大変なのに……。
あいつらのおかげで、遺跡の調査がちっとも進まないんだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_002<tab>I might as well pack up my instruments and go home, as I won't be getting an onze of research done. If, however, a kind adventurer like yourself were to use these scarecrows to drive the birds away, it would be another story. What do you say?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_002そうだ、あの鳥たちを追い払ってくれないかな？
この「」を、
4つほど仕掛けてくれればいいんだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_020<tab>Do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> look─oh, you've seen to the birds, have you? Splendid work, friend! Now to head back down and return to my research. Er, worry not, I'll be along any moment now─be on your way.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_020いやあ、おかげで調査を進められそうだよ。
ありがとう、助かった。
あとは高所恐怖症を克服するだけか……。
